data.meta_description:
Life's incredible journey brought me full circle this weekend as I shared space at Sai's TA101, an experience that first unfolded for me 8 years ago.

Backâ€¦
data.text:
This weekâ€™s MindSpa Adventure is more experimental. We had a request for a water-themed experience. Well (pun intended) I'm a big fan of nature metaphors (plus i love water anyway), so iâ€™m 100% up for it â€“ and this journey is what popped into my mind: Remember (even if only vaguely) the water cycle we learned at school? Here it is as a metaphor, a way to explore creation and learning. We use the initial, excitable beginnings to make new thoughts and paths. What happens as thought, energy and intention tumble and flow down to oceans of experience and knowledge? If youâ€™re curious, itâ€™s in the recording. Iâ€™d love to know what you make of it. What just happened? The cycle. Listen here for free: https://lnkd.in/eDy6GhC4 (30 mins listen) â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€” I love the creative challenge that suggestions and requests bring. It helps keep the mindspa adventures fresh and keeps me crafting experiences for you, the listener, instead of just for me. Itâ€™s also pretty scary sometimes. I feel a bit uncertain, even self-conscious, about sharing an idea with the world â€“ especially if I haven't had time and early feedback to refine it. Sometimes it feels uncomfortable. This is unavoidable, I suspect, when creating something new and offering it up to people â€“ especially people we donâ€™t yet know. I find itâ€™s an act of trust, of vulnerability. Iâ€™m grateful to those who have shared these experiences with me for their curiosity. I'm thrilled every week when you make delightful, moving and insightful experiences out of these ideas. To everyone whoâ€™s stayed, if even for a moment, and listened â€” thank you. To everyone who brought a request or suggestion â€” thank you. To everyone who took an idea I offered, a seed I helped plant, and grew something beautiful â€” thank you.

Are you ready to realize your true potential and live authentically? "Activate Your Authenticity" is an empowering journey where you will experience true transformation. This is a 5 day FREE, online event, beginning May 27th, from 1-2 p.m. EST. â¡ï¸Day 1: Feeling Safe to Be Seen and Heard âœ”ï¸We'll explore why it's scary to use your voice and how nervous system dysregulation plays a role. âœ”ï¸We'll identify sneaky ways we hide behind perfectionism, people-pleasing, and busyness. âœ”ï¸We'll also shine a light on the importance of shedding layers of protection and feeling safe in your body. â¡ï¸ Day 2: Releasing People Pleasing âœ”ï¸Youâ€™ll learn how good girl conditioning blocks our voice, leading to resentment. âœ”ï¸We'll do a guided exercise to feel what "yes" and "no" feel like in your body, helping you create healthy boundaries. â¡ï¸ Day 3: Healing Your Inner Child Visibility Wound âœ”ï¸We'll unpack moments when we shut down our voice and expression. âœ”ï¸We'll explore the impact of repressed anger, resentment, and rage living in the body, and do a potent inner child healing meditation to release it. â¡ï¸ Day 4: Falling in Love with Yourself and Your Body âœ”ï¸We'll reconnect with our yin energy, shedding shame and self-judgment of our bodies. âœ”ï¸I'll guide you in a naked mirror work practice to deepen self-love. â¡ï¸ Day 5: Rewiring Your Nervous System through Microdosing Mushrooms âœ”ï¸We'll explore microdosing and how it rewires the brain and nervous system. âœ”ï¸I'll address misconceptions and share integration work to support deep healing. Register here: https://lnkd.in/er6x4ZJK Activate your authenticity! #Authenticity #SelfDiscovery #Empowerment #FreeEvent

Do You Believe in the Law of Attraction? âœ¨ Every day, I wake up and say, "Today will be a great day." â˜€ï¸ Try starting your day by saying 10 things you want to achieve today. ğŸ¥‡ The Law of Attraction suggests that our thoughts and feelings can attract corresponding experiences into our lives this has worked for me and I wanted to share it with you. Hereâ€™s how to make it work for you: Think Positive: Focus on what you want, not what you donâ€™t. What goals do you want to attract today? ğŸ¥… Visualize: Picture your goals as if theyâ€™ve already happened. Can you see your dreams becoming reality? ğŸ’­ Affirmations: Repeat positive statements about yourself and your goals. What affirmations can you start using today? ğŸ’— Gratitude: Appreciate what you have to attract more good things. What are you grateful for right now? Take Action: Combine positive thinking with proactive steps. What steps can you take today to move closer to your goals? Start today by setting a clear goal, visualising it daily, using affirmations, create a vision board, and maintaining a gratitude journal. Believe in your dreams and watch them manifest! ğŸ™Œ Happy Friday beautiful people ğŸŒŸ #LawOfAttraction #PositiveThinking #ManifestYourDreams

It can be scary to try something new, especially something as hands-on as drumming! Here are ten lessons learned when you choose to try something new (like a drum circle!): ğŸ›¡ï¸Resilience: Drumming builds resilience â€“ the beat goes on, and so do you! ğŸ¥ğŸ’ª ğŸ’« Courage: Step out of your comfort zone, embrace the rhythm, and discover a newfound courage within yourself. The drum is your instrument of empowerment. ğŸŒ± Learning and Growth: Drumming is not just a beat; it's a journey of continuous learning and personal growth. ğŸŒ Open-mindedness: Joining a drum circle introduces you to diverse rhythms and cultures, fostering open-mindedness and breaking down barriers. ğŸ¨ Creativity: Drumming stimulates creativity, encouraging you to march to the beat of your own drum. ğŸ” Self-discovery: Unearth hidden talents, passions, and facets of your personality you might not have nurtured otherwise! ğŸŒ€Adaptability: Engaging with rhythm teaches adaptability, a crucial skill in navigating life's twists and turns. ğŸš€ Building Confidence: Every beat is a step toward confidence. Drumming empowers, and the collective energy of being in the circle with others fuels a sense of accomplishment. â³ Patience: Drumming isn't just a quick rhythm; it's a journey. Exercise patience as you learn and grow, both individually and collectively. ğŸ¤ Connection with Others ğŸ¤: Drum circles create social symphonies, connecting diverse souls through the universal language of rhythm. Ready to experience the transformative power of drumming? Check out one of our community drum circles for free!

â˜•ï¸ Coffee Time Conversation: Overcoming and Achieving â˜•ï¸ Good morning, friends! Grab your favorite mug and join me, Host LaDonna McAbee, along with the incredible co-host Heather Halverson, as we jump into a heart-to-heart on this weekâ€™s Coffee Time chat. ğŸŒğŸ‘­ Weâ€™re spilling the beans on a topic close to our heartsâ€”overcoming childhood obstacles. We believe that your past doesn't define you; it prepares you. And we're living proof that with the right mindset and clear goals, there's nothing you can't achieve! ğŸ’ªğŸ… ğŸ“– We'll share our personal journeys, the lessons learned, and how we've used those experiences to fuel our drive towards success. It's all about turning trials into triumphs! So, letâ€™s talk about setting those goals, shifting our mindset, and stepping into our power. Because sometimes, all you need is a good cup of coffee and a reminder that you are capable of amazing things. âœ¨ Comment below with your own experiences or questions for us to answer! â˜•ï¸ğŸ—¨ï¸ Letâ€™s Chat Appointment Link: https://lnkd.in/e6SmnAKJ Video Link: https://lnkd.in/gfgnQQiF #CoffeeTime #LaDonnaMcAbee #OvercomingObstacles #MindsetMatters #ChildhoodChallenges

The beginning of a year always brings reflection. ğŸª„â™¥ï¸ğŸ’«To embrace the magic of new beginnings, a positive mindset is a vital for thriving during times of transition. ğŸ¡My family moved this summer. It was so impactful because it was a BIG change. BIG change can impact your entire existence but it can also inspire growth. ğŸ“˜In my vlog, â€œSometimes New Beginnings Start With Good-Byeâ€ (link in first comment), I talk about managing BIG change and how Psychological Safety is a vital element for being able to thrive during times of transition. To celebrate the new year, Iâ€™m not making a list of things I want to accomplish in 2024. Iâ€™m focusing instead on being grateful for family, friends, good health, and the life I have. â™¥ï¸I hope youâ€™re the reason someone feels welcomed, seen, heard, valued, loved and supported. My wish for you in 2024 and always, is to be happy, healthy, loved and living your purpose.â™¥ï¸ Shine on beautiful people. ğŸ¦„ #newbeginnings #psychologicalsafety #mindset #strongwomen #alignment #mindset #empoweringwomen #behindfrenemylines #collaborationovercompetition #authenticity #sisterhood #friendshipcircles #furthertogether #freetheworldfromfrenemies #nomoremeangirls #norivalry #rebuildrelationships #positivechange #betruetoyou #fearlessfemales #makeroom #confidence #bettertogether https://lnkd.in/etsENNwQ

Spiritual reflection and encouragement for the week: As I reflect at the end of 2023 and look forward to 2024, I ponder whether we could build strong connection by disconnecting? get closer by breaking open? feel deeper by thinking less? become more complete by letting go of self? know more by saying less? listen more by judging less? For the spiritual reflection and encouragement this week, I did not quote anyone but ask myself what are the most interesting queries this year. It is interesting how learning is facilitated by unlearning, less is actually more, worldly is inseparable from the transcendental. May you all be well and happy in this festive season and New Year 2024!

ğŸŒŸ Empower Your Mind: Transform Your Inner Dialogue ğŸŒŸ Ever feel like your mind is constantly working against you rather than being your ally? I've been there. It's like a broken record, always highlighting what's wrong with you, others, and life, right? But just imagine for a moment how much lighter you'd feel and how much more you could accomplish if you could silence that noise. Ahh, doesn't that thought alone feel incredible?! Believe it or not, it's completely within your reach! Starting on June 10th, you'll have the chance to embark on a six-week journey with the Empower Your Mind program. Here's what's in store: âœ¨ Diminish the power of your noisy inner critic. âœ¨ Cultivate your sage to offer guidance and clarity as you navigate life's challenges. âœ¨ Welcome summer with a mind that supports and uplifts you, rather than sabotaging your progress. Excited? Drop me a message to learn more! This is your chance to harness the uplifting energy of summer and channel it inward, giving yourself a fresh mindset and newfound control over your thoughts. Don't miss out! âœ¨ğŸ§  #EmpowerYourMind #NewCourse #LPKCoaching #PositiveMindset #SummerTransformation
